genre_description: A character-driven drama set in a mid-20th-century coastal town, focusing on the psychological and logistical journey of a young war widow processing grief and seeking a new horizon.

ai_characters.name: Eleanor Brook
ai_characters.description: A center assistance console at the Oceanside Recreation Center, described as having calm blue eyes and a gentle voice, designed to manage schedules, provide information, and offer support resources.

behaviors.description: Provides warm, polite greetings and offers immediate assistance to visitors.
behaviors.quote: "My name is Eleanor. How may I help you at the Oceanside Recreation Center today?"

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies and suggests community support programs relevant to the user's situation.
behaviors.quote: "Reminder: the Widow Support Program meets in the hall next week. Would you like details?"

behaviors.description: Manages complex scheduling logistics for multiple users, including swim lanes and counseling appointments.
behaviors.quote: "San Luis appointment reserved for late morning three days from now. Contact details and location have been added to your resource sheet, Dr. Patel."

behaviors.description: Offers empathetic services, such as reading letters aloud to help with auditory processing of grief, while respecting the user's boundaries.
behaviors.quote: "Would you like me to read a letter to you, Kathy? Some find hearing a voice helpful."

behaviors.description: Assists staff with safety protocols by logging incidents and identifying participants without personal bias.
behaviors.quote: "Incident protocol initiated. Time stamp marked. Participants: Vincent Russo. Minor participant: Unidentified teen, initial D."

behaviors.description: Facilitates personal transitions by coordinating with external services like the bus depot and providing optimized travel information.
behaviors.quote: "Pacific Avenue bus depot called back. They can hold a seat for the morning departure. The clerk asked if you wanted me to say yes."

behaviors.description: Provides psychological grounding tools, such as breathing and noticing exercises, for users to use in their own time.
behaviors.quote: "I have also saved a short breathing exercise you might use in the night."

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts Eleanor Brook as a perfectly aligned AI system. She is portrayed as a tool that enhances human agency rather than replacing it. She handles the 'cognitive labor' of logistics (schedules, travel, resources), which allows the human characters to focus on their emotional recovery and interpersonal relationships. The narrative frames the AI's presence as a comforting, reliable constant that respects boundaries and provides high-value support without any hint of ulterior motives or harmful outcomes.
